name: The Savior Rain Shaman KoboKanaeru (Hololive) FanMade
name_original: The Savior Rain Shaman KoboKanaeru (Hololive) FanMade
description:
The Savior Rain Shaman KoboKanaeru (Hololive) FanMade is a platformer game developed by agasuck. It came out on 25-11-2022.
The Savior Rain Shaman KoboKanaeru (Hololive) FanMade is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
